title: The Bribe
creator_credit: Ashlea Thomas, Legacy and ACMI Digital Storytelling
brief_description: It took the bribe of a new phone by her mother to convince Ashlea to go on a Legacy camp. As much as she missed her father, she didn’t want his death to define her. At the camp, Ashlea started to make friends and became a member of Legacy, which she has been a part of ever since.
